trainingItems.title: Running
trainingItems.description: Running is a fundamental cardiovascular exercise that effectively improves heart and lung function, burns calories, and strengthens leg muscles.
benefits: Burns calories and aids weight loss

trainingMethod.warmUp: 5-10 minutes of light walking or jogging
trainingMethod.coolDown: 5-10 minutes of light walking and stretching

week1.title: Week 1: Building Foundation
week1.description: Adapt to running rhythm and build basic endurance

sessions.content: Jog 10 minutes + brisk walk 5 minutes, repeat 2 times
sessions.tips: Maintain a comfortable pace, don't overexert yourself

sessions.content: Rest or light stretching
sessions.tips: Allow your body to fully recover

sessions.content: Jog 15 minutes + brisk walk 5 minutes
Rest
Jog 12 minutes + brisk walk 3 minutes, repeat 2 times
Easy jog 20 minutes
Rest
sessions.tips: Week summary, prepare for next week

week2.title: Week 2: Increasing Endurance
week2.description: Increase running time and intensity to improve cardiovascular endurance

sessions.content: Jog 20 minutes + brisk walk 3 minutes, repeat 2 times
Rest or light stretching
Continuous jog 25 minutes
Rest
Interval run: fast run 2 minutes + slow jog 3 minutes, repeat 4 times
Easy jog 30 minutes
sessions.tips: Long slow distance run to build endurance base

sessions.content: Rest

week3.title: Week 3: Consolidation and Improvement
week3.description: Consolidate training results and further improve running ability

sessions.content: Continuous jog 30 minutes
Rest or light stretching
Interval run: fast run 3 minutes + slow jog 2 minutes, repeat 5 times
Rest
Continuous jog 35 minutes
Easy jog 25 minutes + stretching
Test: continuous jog 40 minutes
sessions.tips: Test three weeks of training results

precautions: Choose appropriate running shoes to protect your feet
Pay attention to running posture to avoid injury
Adjust intensity according to physical condition

trainingItems.title: Strength Training
trainingItems.description: Strength training can enhance muscle strength, improve body shape, increase basal metabolic rate, and is an important component of comprehensive fitness.

trainingMethod.warmUp: 10 minutes of dynamic warm-up and joint mobility

week1.title: Week 1: Building Basic Strength
week1.description: Learn correct movements and build basic strength

sessions.title: Upper Body Strength Training
sessions.content:
Dumbbell Press 3 sets × 12 reps
Dumbbell Flyes 3 sets × 12 reps
Push-ups 3 sets × 10 reps
Tricep Extensions 3 sets × 12 reps
sessions.tips: Choose appropriate weight, maintain proper form

sessions.title: Rest
sessions.content: Full rest to allow muscle recovery

sessions.title: Lower Body Strength Training
sessions.content:
Squats 3 sets × 15 reps
Lunges 3 sets × 12 reps (each leg)
Deadlifts 3 sets × 12 reps
Calf Raises 3 sets × 15 reps

sessions.title: Rest
sessions.content: Recovery day

sessions.title: Core Strength Training
sessions.content:
Plank 3 sets × 30 seconds
Crunches 3 sets × 15 reps
Russian Twists 3 sets × 20 reps
Leg Raises 3 sets × 12 reps

sessions.title: Full Body Strength Training
sessions.content:
Squats 3 sets × 12 reps
Push-ups 3 sets × 10 reps
Rows 3 sets × 12 reps
Plank 3 sets × 30 seconds

sessions.title: Rest
sessions.content: Week summary, prepare for next week

week2.title: Week 2: Increasing Intensity
week2.description: Increase training intensity and weight to improve muscle strength

sessions.title: Upper Body Strength Training (Advanced)
sessions.content:
Dumbbell Press 4 sets × 10 reps
Dumbbell Flyes 4 sets × 10 reps
Push-ups 4 sets × 12 reps
Tricep Extensions 4 sets × 10 reps
Pull-ups (assisted) 3 sets × 8 reps

sessions.title: Rest
sessions.content: Recovery day

sessions.title: Lower Body Strength Training (Advanced)
sessions.content:
Squats 4 sets × 12 reps
Lunges 4 sets × 12 reps (each leg)
Deadlifts 4 sets × 10 reps
Single Leg Squats 3 sets × 8 reps (each leg)
Calf Raises 4 sets × 15 reps

sessions.title: Rest
sessions.content: Recovery day

sessions.title: Core Strength Training (Advanced)
sessions.content:
Plank 4 sets × 45 seconds
Crunches 4 sets × 20 reps
Russian Twists 4 sets × 25 reps
Leg Raises 4 sets × 15 reps
Side Plank 3 sets × 30 seconds (each side)

sessions.title: Full Body Strength Training (Advanced)
sessions.content:
Squats 4 sets × 12 reps
Push-ups 4 sets × 12 reps
Rows 4 sets × 12 reps
Plank 4 sets × 45 seconds
Burpees 3 sets × 10 reps

sessions.title: Rest
sessions.content: Week summary

week3.title: Week 3: Consolidation and Improvement
week3.description: Consolidate training results and challenge higher intensity

sessions.title: Upper Body Strength Training (Expert)
sessions.content:
Dumbbell Press 4 sets × 12 reps
Dumbbell Flyes 4 sets × 12 reps
Push-ups 4 sets × 15 reps
Tricep Extensions 4 sets × 12 reps
Pull-ups 3 sets × 10 reps
Shoulder Press 3 sets × 12 reps

sessions.title: Rest
sessions.content: Recovery day

sessions.title: Lower Body Strength Training (Expert)
sessions.content:
Squats 4 sets × 15 reps
Lunges 4 sets × 15 reps (each leg)
Deadlifts 4 sets × 12 reps
Single Leg Squats 4 sets × 10 reps (each leg)
Bulgarian Split Squats 3 sets × 12 reps (each leg)
Calf Raises 4 sets × 20 reps

sessions.title: Rest
sessions.content: Recovery day

sessions.title: Core Strength Training (Expert)
sessions.content:
Plank 4 sets × 60 seconds
Crunches 4 sets × 25 reps
Russian Twists 4 sets × 30 reps
Leg Raises 4 sets × 20 reps
Side Plank 4 sets × 45 seconds (each side)
Hanging Leg Raises 3 sets × 12 reps

sessions.title: Full Body Strength Training (Expert)
sessions.content:
Squats 4 sets × 15 reps
Push-ups 4 sets × 15 reps
Rows 4 sets × 15 reps
Plank 4 sets × 60 seconds
Burpees 4 sets × 12 reps
Kettlebell Swings 3 sets × 15 reps

sessions.title: Test Day
sessions.content:
Maximum strength test:
Squat max weight test
Push-up max reps test
Plank max time test
sessions.tips: Test three weeks of training results

precautions: Choose appropriate weight and progress gradually

trainingItems.title: Yoga
trainingItems.description: Yoga is a comprehensive mind-body practice that improves flexibility, balance, and mental calm through postures, breathing, and meditation.

trainingMethod.warmUp: 5 minutes of gentle movement and breathing

week1.title: Week 1: Foundation and Basics
week1.description: Learn basic poses and breathing techniques

sessions.title: Basic Standing Poses
sessions.content:
Mountain Pose (Tadasana) 5 breaths
Warrior I (Virabhadrasana I) 5 breaths each side
Warrior II (Virabhadrasana II) 5 breaths each side
Tree Pose (Vrikshasana) 5 breaths each side
Downward Dog (Adho Mukha Svanasana) 10 breaths

sessions.title: Seated Poses and Flexibility
sessions.content:
Easy Pose (Sukhasana) 5 minutes
Seated Forward Fold (Paschimottanasana) 10 breaths
Butterfly Pose (Baddha Konasana) 10 breaths
Spinal Twist (Ardha Matsyendrasana) 5 breaths each side

sessions.title: Core and Balance
sessions.content:
Plank Pose 30 seconds
Boat Pose (Navasana) 5 breaths
Bridge Pose (Setu Bandhasana) 10 breaths
Child's Pose (Balasana) 10 breaths

sessions.title: Restorative Practice
sessions.content:
Legs Up the Wall (Viparita Karani) 5 minutes
Reclining Twist 3 minutes each side
Corpse Pose (Savasana) 10 minutes

sessions.title: Full Body Flow
sessions.content:
Sun Salutation A - 3 rounds
Warrior sequence
Triangle Pose (Trikonasana) 5 breaths each side
Final relaxation 5 minutes

sessions.title: Hip Opening and Flexibility
sessions.content:
Pigeon Pose (Eka Pada Rajakapotasana) 10 breaths each side
Lizard Pose 5 breaths each side
Happy Baby Pose (Ananda Balasana) 10 breaths
Seated Forward Fold 10 breaths

sessions.title: Rest and Reflection
sessions.content:
Gentle stretching
Meditation 10 minutes
Week reflection
sessions.tips: Rest and prepare for next week

week2.title: Week 2: Deepening Practice
week2.description: Deepen poses and explore more challenging sequences

sessions.title: Advanced Standing Poses
sessions.content:
Warrior III (Virabhadrasana III) 5 breaths each side
Half Moon Pose (Ardha Chandrasana) 5 breaths each side
Extended Side Angle (Utthita Parsvakonasana) 5 breaths each side
Standing Forward Fold (Uttanasana) 10 breaths

sessions.title: Backbends and Heart Openers
sessions.content:
Cobra Pose (Bhujangasana) 10 breaths
Upward Dog (Urdhva Mukha Svanasana) 5 breaths
Bow Pose (Dhanurasana) 5 breaths
Bridge Pose 10 breaths
Wheel Pose (Urdhva Dhanurasana) - preparation

sessions.title: Core Strength and Balance
sessions.content:
Plank variations 3 sets × 30 seconds
Side Plank 30 seconds each side
Boat Pose 10 breaths
Crow Pose (Bakasana) - practice

sessions.title: Hip and Hamstring Flexibility
sessions.content:
Pigeon Pose 15 breaths each side
Lizard Pose 10 breaths each side
Seated Forward Fold 15 breaths
Reclining Hand-to-Big-Toe Pose (Supta Padangusthasana) 10 breaths each side

sessions.title: Sun Salutation Flow
sessions.content:
Sun Salutation A - 5 rounds
Sun Salutation B - 3 rounds
Warrior sequence flow
Final relaxation 10 minutes

sessions.title: Inversions and Arm Balances
sessions.content:
Downward Dog variations
Dolphin Pose 10 breaths
Headstand preparation
Crow Pose practice
Shoulderstand (Sarvangasana) 10 breaths

sessions.title: Restorative and Meditation
sessions.content:
Restorative poses 20 minutes
Pranayama (breathing exercises) 10 minutes
Meditation 15 minutes

week3.title: Week 3: Mastery and Integration
week3.description: Master poses and integrate all elements into a complete practice

sessions.title: Complete Standing Sequence
sessions.content:
Sun Salutation A & B - 5 rounds each
Warrior I, II, III sequence
Half Moon Pose
Extended Triangle Pose
Standing Split
Final relaxation

sessions.title: Advanced Backbends
sessions.content:
Wheel Pose (Urdhva Dhanurasana) 5 breaths
Bow Pose 10 breaths
Camel Pose (Ustrasana) 10 breaths
Fish Pose (Matsyasana) 10 breaths
Counter poses and relaxation

sessions.title: Arm Balances and Inversions
sessions.content:
Crow Pose (Bakasana) 5 breaths
Side Crow Pose 5 breaths each side
Headstand (Sirsasana) 10 breaths
Handstand preparation
Shoulderstand 15 breaths

sessions.title: Deep Hip Opening
sessions.content:
Pigeon Pose variations 15 breaths each side
Lizard Pose 10 breaths each side
Fire Log Pose (Agnistambhasana) 10 breaths each side
Butterfly Pose 15 breaths
Seated Forward Fold 15 breaths

sessions.title: Complete Vinyasa Flow
sessions.content:
Full Sun Salutation sequence
Warrior flow series
Balance poses
Backbends
Final relaxation 15 minutes

sessions.title: Restorative and Yin Practice
sessions.content:
Yin poses: Dragon Pose, Sphinx Pose, Seal Pose
Legs Up the Wall 10 minutes
Reclining poses 15 minutes
Meditation 20 minutes

sessions.title: Final Practice and Reflection
sessions.content:
Your choice of favorite poses
Complete flow sequence
Pranayama 15 minutes
Meditation 20 minutes
Three weeks reflection

precautions: Listen to your body and don't push beyond your limits
Avoid practicing on a full stomach
Consult a doctor if you have injuries or medical conditions

trainingItems.title: HIIT
trainingItems.description: High-Intensity Interval Training (HIIT) alternates between short bursts of intense exercise and brief recovery periods, maximizing calorie burn and improving cardiovascular fitness in minimal time.

week1.title: Week 1: Introduction to HIIT
week1.description: Learn basic HIIT patterns and build endurance

sessions.content:
Warm-up 5 min
30 sec high knees + 30 sec rest, repeat 8 times
30 sec jumping jacks + 30 sec rest, repeat 8 times
Cool-down 5 min
sessions.tips: Focus on form, intensity will come with practice

sessions.content: Rest or light stretching

Warm-up 5 min
30 sec burpees + 30 sec rest, repeat 6 times
30 sec mountain climbers + 30 sec rest, repeat 6 times
Cool-down 5 min
Rest

Warm-up 5 min
40 sec squat jumps + 20 sec rest, repeat 8 times
40 sec plank + 20 sec rest, repeat 6 times
Cool-down 5 min

Warm-up 5 min
20 sec sprint + 40 sec walk, repeat 10 times
Cool-down 5 min
Rest
sessions.tips: Week summary, prepare for next week

week2.title: Week 2: Increasing Intensity
week2.description: Increase work intervals and reduce rest time

sessions.content:
Warm-up 5 min
45 sec high knees + 15 sec rest, repeat 10 times
45 sec jumping jacks + 15 sec rest, repeat 10 times
Cool-down 5 min
Rest or light stretching

Warm-up 5 min
45 sec burpees + 15 sec rest, repeat 8 times
45 sec mountain climbers + 15 sec rest, repeat 8 times
45 sec plank jacks + 15 sec rest, repeat 6 times
Cool-down 5 min
sessions.tips: Challenge yourself with longer work periods

sessions.content: Rest

Warm-up 5 min
50 sec squat jumps + 10 sec rest, repeat 10 times
50 sec push-ups + 10 sec rest, repeat 8 times
Cool-down 5 min

Warm-up 5 min
30 sec sprint + 30 sec jog, repeat 12 times
Cool-down 5 min
Rest

week3.title: Week 3: Advanced HIIT
week3.description: Master advanced HIIT patterns and maximize performance

sessions.content:
Warm-up 5 min
60 sec high knees + 20 sec rest, repeat 8 times
60 sec jumping jacks + 20 sec rest, repeat 8 times
60 sec burpees + 20 sec rest, repeat 6 times
Cool-down 5 min
sessions.tips: Longer work intervals for advanced training

sessions.content: Rest or light stretching

Warm-up 5 min
Tabata: 20 sec work + 10 sec rest, repeat 8 rounds
Exercise 1: Burpees
Exercise 2: Mountain climbers
Exercise 3: Squat jumps
Exercise 4: Push-ups
Cool-down 5 min
sessions.tips: Classic Tabata protocol for maximum intensity

sessions.content: Rest

Warm-up 5 min
60 sec squat jumps + 15 sec rest, repeat 10 times
60 sec plank + 15 sec rest, repeat 8 times
60 sec jumping lunges + 15 sec rest, repeat 8 times
Cool-down 5 min

Warm-up 5 min
45 sec sprint + 15 sec walk, repeat 15 times
Cool-down 5 min

Test: Complete 20-minute HIIT circuit
5 exercises, 4 rounds each
Test your three weeks of progress
sessions.tips: Test three weeks of training results

precautions: Start with lower intensity if you're a beginner
Listen to your body and rest if needed
Maintain proper form to prevent injury
Cool down and stretch after each session
Consult a doctor if you have heart conditions

trainingItems.title: Pilates
trainingItems.description: Pilates is a low-impact exercise method that focuses on core strength, flexibility, and body alignment through controlled movements and breathing techniques.

week1.title: Week 1: Foundation and Core
week1.description: Learn basic Pilates principles and core exercises

sessions.content:
Hundred 10 breaths × 3 sets
Roll Up 8 reps
Single Leg Stretch 10 reps each leg
Double Leg Stretch 10 reps
Criss Cross 10 reps each side
sessions.tips: Focus on breathing and core engagement

sessions.content: Rest or light stretching

Spine Stretch Forward 8 reps
Saw 8 reps each side
Swan Prep 8 reps
Single Leg Kick 10 reps each leg
Double Leg Kick 10 reps
Rest

Hundred 10 breaths × 3 sets
Roll Up 10 reps
Scissors 10 reps each leg
Bicycle 10 reps each side
Shoulder Bridge 10 reps

Spine Twist 10 reps each side
Side Kick Series 10 reps each side
Leg Circles 10 reps each direction
Teaser Prep 5 reps
Rest
sessions.tips: Week summary, prepare for next week

week2.title: Week 2: Building Strength
week2.description: Increase repetitions and add more challenging exercises

sessions.content:
Hundred 10 breaths × 4 sets
Roll Up 12 reps
Single Leg Stretch 12 reps each leg
Double Leg Stretch 12 reps
Criss Cross 12 reps each side
Teaser 8 reps
Rest or light stretching

Spine Stretch Forward 12 reps
Saw 12 reps each side
Swan 10 reps
Single Leg Kick 12 reps each leg
Double Leg Kick 12 reps
Swimming 10 reps
Rest

Hundred 10 breaths × 4 sets
Roll Up 12 reps
Scissors 12 reps each leg
Bicycle 12 reps each side
Shoulder Bridge 12 reps
Leg Pull Front 8 reps each side

Spine Twist 12 reps each side
Side Kick Series 12 reps each side
Leg Circles 12 reps each direction
Teaser 10 reps
Side Plank 30 seconds each side
Rest

week3.title: Week 3: Advanced Practice
week3.description: Master advanced movements and create flowing sequences

sessions.content:
Hundred 10 breaths × 5 sets
Roll Up 15 reps
Single Leg Stretch 15 reps each leg
Double Leg Stretch 15 reps
Criss Cross 15 reps each side
Teaser 12 reps
Corkscrew 10 reps each direction
Rest or light stretching

Spine Stretch Forward 15 reps
Saw 15 reps each side
Swan 12 reps
Single Leg Kick 15 reps each leg
Double Leg Kick 15 reps
Swimming 12 reps
Rocking 10 reps
Rest

Hundred 10 breaths × 5 sets
Roll Up 15 reps
Scissors 15 reps each leg
Bicycle 15 reps each side
Shoulder Bridge 15 reps
Leg Pull Front 12 reps each side
Leg Pull Back 10 reps each side

Spine Twist 15 reps each side
Side Kick Series 15 reps each side
Leg Circles 15 reps each direction
Teaser 12 reps
Side Plank 45 seconds each side
Star 8 reps

Complete Pilates flow sequence
All favorite exercises
Test your three weeks of progress
sessions.tips: Test three weeks of training results

precautions: Consult a doctor if you have back problems

trainingItems.title: Cycling
trainingItems.description: Cycling is an excellent low-impact cardiovascular exercise that strengthens leg muscles, improves endurance, and can be done both indoors and outdoors.

trainingMethod.coolDown: 5-10 minutes of easy pedaling and stretching

week1.title: Week 1: Building Base
week1.description: Establish cycling rhythm and build basic endurance

sessions.content:
Easy ride 20 minutes at comfortable pace
Focus on smooth pedaling technique
sessions.tips: Maintain steady cadence, don't push too hard

sessions.content: Rest or light stretching

Easy ride 25 minutes
Include 3 × 2-minute moderate efforts with 2-minute recovery
Rest

Easy ride 30 minutes at steady pace
Focus on maintaining consistent speed

Easy ride 20 minutes
Include gentle hills or resistance changes
Rest
sessions.tips: Week summary, prepare for next week

week2.title: Week 2: Increasing Distance
week2.description: Increase ride duration and add more intervals

sessions.content:
Moderate ride 35 minutes
Include 4 × 3-minute moderate efforts with 2-minute recovery
Rest or light stretching

Easy ride 40 minutes at steady pace
Focus on maintaining cadence
Rest

Interval ride 30 minutes
5 × 2-minute hard efforts with 3-minute easy recovery

Long easy ride 45 minutes
Maintain comfortable pace throughout
Rest

week3.title: Week 3: Advanced Training
week3.description: Challenge with longer rides and varied intensity

sessions.content:
Interval ride 35 minutes
6 × 3-minute hard efforts with 2-minute recovery
Focus on maintaining power
Rest or light stretching

Tempo ride 45 minutes
20 minutes at moderate-hard pace in the middle
Rest

Hill intervals 40 minutes
8 × 1-minute hill efforts with 2-minute recovery
Or resistance intervals if indoors

Long ride 50-60 minutes
Maintain steady pace, enjoy the ride

Test: 30-minute time trial
Ride at your best effort for 30 minutes
Test your three weeks of progress
sessions.tips: Test three weeks of training results

precautions: Always wear a helmet when cycling outdoors
Check your bike before each ride
Be aware of traffic and road conditions
Warm up and cool down properly

trainingItems.title: Boxing
trainingItems.description: Boxing training combines cardiovascular exercise with strength training, improving coordination, agility, and overall fitness through punching combinations and footwork.

trainingMethod.warmUp: 10 minutes of light movement and shadow boxing

week1.title: Week 1: Fundamentals
week1.description: Learn basic boxing stance, punches, and footwork

sessions.content:
Warm-up 10 min
Basic stance and footwork 10 min
Jab practice 5 min
Cross practice 5 min
Shadow boxing 5 min
Cool-down 10 min
sessions.tips: Focus on proper form and technique

sessions.content: Rest or light stretching

Warm-up 10 min
Hook practice 5 min
Uppercut practice 5 min
Jab-Cross combination 10 min
Shadow boxing 5 min
Cool-down 10 min
Rest

Warm-up 10 min
Footwork drills 10 min
Jab-Cross-Hook combination 10 min
Bag work (if available) 5 min
Shadow boxing 5 min
Cool-down 10 min

Warm-up 10 min
Defensive movements 10 min
All basic combinations 10 min
Shadow boxing 10 min
Cool-down 10 min
Rest
sessions.tips: Week summary, prepare for next week

week2.title: Week 2: Building Combinations
week2.description: Develop punch combinations and increase intensity

sessions.content:
Warm-up 10 min
Advanced footwork 10 min
Jab-Cross-Hook-Uppercut combo 10 min
Bag work 10 min
Shadow boxing 5 min
Cool-down 10 min
Rest or light stretching

Warm-up 10 min
Speed bag or pad work 10 min
Multiple combinations 15 min
Defensive drills 5 min
Shadow boxing 5 min
Cool-down 10 min
Rest

Warm-up 10 min
Interval bag work: 3 min work, 1 min rest × 5 rounds
Shadow boxing 5 min
Cool-down 10 min

Warm-up 10 min
Footwork and movement drills 10 min
Complex combinations 15 min
Defensive and counter-attack practice 5 min
Cool-down 10 min
Rest

week3.title: Week 3: Advanced Training
week3.description: Master advanced combinations and maximize performance

sessions.content:
Warm-up 10 min
Advanced footwork patterns 10 min
Complex 6-8 punch combinations 15 min
Heavy bag work 10 min
Shadow boxing 5 min
Cool-down 10 min
Rest or light stretching

Warm-up 10 min
Speed and agility drills 10 min
Interval training: 3 min rounds × 6 with 1 min rest
Shadow boxing 5 min
Cool-down 10 min
Rest

Warm-up 10 min
Defensive and counter-attack combinations 15 min
Power punching drills 10 min
Bag work 10 min
Cool-down 10 min

Warm-up 10 min
Full boxing circuit: combinations, footwork, defense 20 min
Shadow boxing 10 min
Cool-down 10 min

Test: 3-minute rounds × 5
Full intensity boxing rounds
Test your three weeks of progress
sessions.tips: Test three weeks of training results

precautions: Always wrap your hands before training
Maintain proper form to prevent injury
Consult a doctor if you have hand or wrist injuries
